name: Foxdie Color Match ( Mac OS X Leopard 2 Blitzr WB)
description:
This code makes Foxdie Firefox Skin compatible with Mac OS X Leopard 2 Windowblinds Theme by Blitzr

to match with other theme just change the color in this line:

         background-color: #b3b3b3  !important;

Hope you like it...

VSDigital
